messages.subject: Re: Video Game Addiction: Does It Occur? If So, Why?
messages.msgSnippet: My son have mates on roblox (a video game online) and they are often grounded (banned? not sure of the word in English) or allowed to play only for a short
messages.messageBody:
My son have mates on roblox (a video game online) and they are often grounded (banned? not sure of the word in English) or allowed to play only for a short time by their parents who believe that to get good grades in school, they can't play video games but study AND because parents believe that playing video games is addictive. It's so sad ... What could I do to be a best friend during those difficult moments ?

Edith
